name: Mad Skills BMX Blitz
description:
The makers of the most addictive racing game ever made, Mad Skills Motocross, have done it again. Apologize now to your girlfriend, boyfriend, wife or husband for all the time you’re about to spend on the best free BMX racing arcade game of all time: Mad Skills BMX Blitz!

Features

RACE 10 CHALLENGING NEW TRACKS!

Beating Mad Skills BMX Blitz is no easy feat. These NEW tracks start out simple, but you’ll have to be on your game to win every level. Once you beat a track, improve your skills by racing against your own record time!

UNBELIEVABLE PHYSICS AND INNOVATIVE NEW CONTROLS!

Based on real BMX racing, the physics of Mad Skills BMX Blitz will blow your mind. Realism and arcade action combine for a completely unique experience. And innovative swipe controls make the game easy to control for beginners but a challenge to master for high-level gamers. You’ve never played a game like this before.

GAME CENTER ACHIEVEMENTS

Earn an Ace Achievement on every track – but you’ll have to be fast to get them all, which will make you a Mad Skills BMX Blitz Legend.

COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS!

Connect to Facebook to race against your friends’ best times on every track, to watch replays of their times, and to fight your way up the leaderboards. Social gaming has never been so fun.

MUSIC BY STRUNG OUT!

Rock out to an awesome soundtrack by legendary punk band Strung Out, or race to your own music.

AND MORE!
✓ Interactive tutorial to learn how to shred.
✓ Universal application: Download it once and play it on all of your compatible iOS devices – and sync your devices using iCloud!
✓ Beautiful settings that are retina optimized for an amazing gameplay experience.

See the official trailer here: http://www.madskillsbmx.com/trailer
Like Mad Skills BMX at www.facebook.com/madskillsbmx
Follow Mad Skills BMX at www.twitter.com/madskillsbmx

Don’t miss Mad Skills Motocross, perhaps the most addictive game ever made for iOS!
